claims.subject: Amazon Inc. (AMZN)
claims.statement: Strong governance and innovation, with growing environmental initiatives. Amazon has committed to net-zero carbon by 2040 and continues to invest in renewable energy projects globally.
claims.author: ESG Rating Agency

claims.subject: Google LLC (GOOGL)
claims.statement: Exceptional environmental leadership with carbon neutrality achieved since 2007. Strong commitment to renewable energy and sustainable technology development.
claims.author: Sustainability Institute

claims.subject: Microsoft Corporation (MSFT)
claims.statement: Leading in responsible AI development and carbon negative commitment by 2030. Strong governance practices and diversity initiatives across global operations.
claims.author: Corporate Responsibility Institute

claims.subject: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
claims.statement: Strong environmental commitment with carbon neutral products and supply chain by 2030. Excellent privacy protection and responsible sourcing practices.
claims.author: Tech Sustainability Council

claims.subject: Tesla Inc. (TSLA)
claims.statement: Revolutionary impact on sustainable transportation and energy storage. Leading the transition to sustainable energy with innovative electric vehicles and solar technology.
claims.author: Clean Energy Institute

claims.subject: Netflix Inc. (NFLX)
claims.statement: Growing commitment to sustainability with renewable energy initiatives. Strong content diversity and inclusion practices, though governance could be improved.
claims.author: Media Sustainability Organization

claims.subject: Meta Platforms Inc. (META)
claims.statement: Significant investments in renewable energy and data center efficiency. However, challenges remain in content moderation and data privacy governance.
claims.author: Digital Ethics Institute

claims.subject: NVIDIA Corporation (NVDA)
claims.statement: Leading in AI technology development with strong environmental commitments. Excellent innovation in sustainable computing and energy-efficient chip design.
claims.author: AI Sustainability Research

nodes.name: Amazon Inc.
nodes.descrip: E-commerce and cloud computing company focused on customer obsession and long-term thinking

nodes.descrip: Technology company specializing in internet-related services and products

nodes.name: Tesla Inc.
nodes.descrip: Electric vehicle and clean energy company accelerating sustainable transport

nodes.name: Netflix Inc.
nodes.descrip: Streaming entertainment service with original and licensed content worldwide

nodes.name: Meta Platforms Inc.
nodes.descrip: Social technology company building the next evolution of social connection

nodes.descrip: Computing platform company accelerating AI and digital transformation
